author: Rick Spilman
content: If I am not mistaken, I believe that the sessions will be posted the next day on the training website.

author: Robert Leeson, jr
content:
Thanks…this sounds very interesting, and I would like to try to attend…but 6 PM is not really a good time…as we have just finished work, come home, getting ready for 7 PM dinner, etc., etc. I suspect others might have the same reactions.

Are there other times available…?
